Name: Tile Conqueror
About the game: You have been sent by your king to collect precious crystals in an unknown world and to secure the land. Collect resources, expand your army, conquer and collect crystals for your king to receive permanent rewards and progress further in the world. Features Gather ressources for new buildings Build different buildings to increase your army Build towers to defend your base Conquer tiles to get more ressources and collect crystals Buy permanent upgrades with the crystals you collect to get stronger in the next round
Meta Title: Tile Conqueror: Feb 3, 2020, Firenja and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Tile Conqueror? Check out the release date (Feb 3, 2020), developer insights from Firenja, and a complete game summary.
